channel.title: ENG on Andrew's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ENG on Andrew's Blog

item.title: Arbitrary Curve Fitting
item.description: Is it possible to determine the best fitting curve to a series of data points just by knowing the form of the function?

item.title: Switching to Hugo
item.description: Jekyll, self hosting a hacked together templating server, or Hugo… the possibilities are endless.

item.title: The Quest for the Atomic G Orbital
item.description: The 5 year journey to finding the G Orbital of an atom.

item.title: SATs and GPAs matter! ...But by how much?
item.description: Looking at the correlation between SATs, GPAs, and college admissions.

item.title: How I Got into Coding
item.description: In today’s digitized age, we are more connected to computers than ever before.
